info.name: KVM Management API
info.description:
# Welcome to EDIS Global Management API ðŸš€

**EDIS Global REST API** allows you to manage every aspect of your VPS, including power cycling, rDNS delegation, triggering installations, custom ISO upload, access to statistics, VNC access including fetching a VNC screenshot, toggle auto-hydration, reading traffic meters, configure callback URLs and more.

## ðŸš€ Get Started Here

Follow these steps to begin using the **EDIS Global Management REST API**:

- **Authentication**: Enable API access on any KVM VPS you own. Then [Create an AUTH Session](https://docs.management-api.edisglobal.com/#a9b63aee-30da-40fb-98d2-f439fc66991c)
    
- **Explore the Endpoints**: Use the endpoints from the documentation below.
    

For product lifecycle management, see our [KVM ORDER API](https://docs.order-api.edisglobal.com)

urlencoded.description: (deprecated) script is going to be executed after installation

urlencoded.value:
#cloud-config
set_hostname: YOUR_HOSTNAME
user: root
password: YOUR_ROOT_PASSWORD
disable_root: false
disable_root_opts: ''
ssh_pwauth: True
manage_etc_hosts: true
expire: False
runcmd:
  - chage -d 19000 root
  - [ /usr/bin/sed, -i, -E, 's/disable_root:.*true/disable_root: false/i', /etc/cloud/cloud.cfg ]
  - [ /usr/bin/sed, -i, -E, 's/#PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin yes/i', /etc/ssh/sshd_config ]
users:
- default
power_state:
 delay: now
 mode: reboot
 message: Bye Bye
 timeout: 30
 condition: True
package_upgrade: true

"#cloud-config
set_hostname: YOUR_HOSTNAME
user: root
password: YOUR_ROOT_PASSWORD
disable_root: false
disable_root_opts: ''
ssh_pwauth: True
manage_etc_hosts: true
expire: False
runcmd:
  - chage -d 19000 root
  - [ /usr/bin/sed, -i, -E, 's/disable_root:.*true/disable_root: false/i', /etc/cloud/cloud.cfg ]
  - [ /usr/bin/sed, -i, -E, 's/#PermitRootLogin.*/PermitRootLogin yes/i', /etc/ssh/sshd_config ]
users:
- default
power_state:
 delay: now
 mode: reboot
 message: Bye Bye
 timeout: 30
 condition: True
package_upgrade: true"
